components.label: Date of Birth of the women

validate.custom: valid = (/^[6-9][0-9]{9}$/.test(input)) ? true : 'Mobile number is not valid';

components.label: Specify
components.tooltip: Please fill the same if place of death is "other"

values.label: During abortion or within 6 weeks after abortion
values.value: During abortion or within 6 weeks after abortion

validate.custom: valid = (moment(input).format("YYYY-MM-DD") >= moment(data.death_date_time).format("YYYY-MM-DD"))? true: 'Date of reporting should be more than or equal to date of death';

components.label: Mobile

validate.custom: valid = (/^[6-9][0-9]{9}$/.test(input)) ? true : 'Mobile number is not valid';

components.customConditional: valid = (/^[6-9][0-9]{9}$/.test(input)) ? true : 'Mobile number is not valid';

validate.custom: valid = (moment(input).format("YYYY-MM-DD") >= moment(data.date_of_reporting).format("YYYY-MM-DD")) ? true : 'Date of Verification should be more than or equal to date of reporting';
